Lasers

A full range of lasers from Topcon, Leica Geosystems, Spectra Precision, Geomax, Imex & Datum that cater for every levelling and alignment task.

Laser Levels include Construction Lasers, Grade Lasers, Pipe Lasers, Line & Dot Lasers.

There is also a comprehensive selection of accessories to help you along with your project more efficiently.

Contact us on 01482 322191 for further information.
